project1.title: Solar System
project1.description: This solar system informational dashboard makes use of jQuery which allowed me to easily and efficiently select elements and attach event listeners.

project2.title: Not Pinterest
project2.description: Modeled after the popular link and image sharing site, Not Pinterest leverages firebase to perform CRUD (create, read, update, delete) functionality on a data set.

project3.title: Nautilus Explorer
project3.description: The Nautilus Explorer dashboard is an exercise in data driven appliactions. As part of a study group, I used firebase to perform CRUD functionality on a complex data set.
